jsdp.sdp

Class StateSpace<SD>

  • java.lang.Object
    • jsdp.sdp.StateSpace<SD>
  • Type Parameters:
    SD - a specific state descriptor for the problem at hand.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<State>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BR_StateSpace, sS_StateSpace, StateSpaceImpl, StateSpaceImpl

    public abstract class StateSpace<SD>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<State>
    An abstract container that stores all generated State.
    Author:
    Roberto Rossi

      • StateSpace

        public StateSpace(int period)
        Constructs a container for states associated with a given period.

      • StateSpace

        public StateSpace(int period,
                  int stateSpaceSizeLowerBound,
                  float loadFactor)
        Constructs a container for states associated with a given period.
        Parameters:
        period - the period associated with this container.
        stateSpaceSizeLowerBound - a lower bound for the sdp state space size, used to initialise the internal hash maps
        loadFactor - the internal hash maps load factor
